Desc.eng: Well, it didn’t take us long to find the first corpse. He’s been dead for a while.
He looks rather un-dead for me. Shouldn’t you recognize your fellow restless souls?
I have… a magical moonstone on me. Take it and free my soul!
Don’t you dare! I want that jewel!
Technically he is not restless. His soul is still bound to the corpse.
I have a bad feeling about this. We should leave.
